snippet: Griner scored 17 points, Tina Charles added 15, and the United States shot 71 percent from the field, a national team record, to rout France, 94-72, in the quarterfinals of the women’s world championship in Istanbul.
abstract: United States basketball team routs France, 94-72, in the quarterfinals of the women's world championships in Istanbul.
lead_paragraph: Griner scored 17 points, Tina Charles added 15, and the United States shot 71 percent from the field, a national team record, to rout France, 94-72, in the quarterfinals of the women’s world championship in Istanbul.
